name: Memento Mori (itch) (Forager, Junktup, erebrus, Postmortem, Secbot, Lilasterix)
name_original: Memento Mori (itch) (Forager, Junktup, erebrus, Postmortem, Secbot, Lilasterix)
description:
Description

A spiritual who-dun-it. You play a spiritual investigator tasked with determining the cause of a mysterious overgrowth ravaging a local graveyard. Talk to the local people and spirits, and then at the end banish the spirit you believe to be guilty.

Controls

Mouse Only

- Hover over graves and left click to interact with spirits. As you speak to the spirits a tarot card will be drawn that reflects their traits

- Click on the lens to activate a spectral view that provides contextual hints as to how the spirits died

Contributors

Erebrus - Project Manager & Lead Developer

Forager - Programmer

Aokomi - Lead Artist

LilAstérix - UI & Environment Artist

Sangoro2 - Artist

Junktup- Lead Composer
